54 template <typename T, typename Range_, typename Storage_, typename Allocator_>
55 inline void btas_subtensor_to_tensor(
56  const btas::Tensor<T, Range_, Storage_>& src, Tensor<T, Allocator_>& dst) {
57  TA_ASSERT(dst.range().rank() == src.range().rank());
58 
59  const auto& src_range = src.range();
60  const auto& dst_range = dst.range();
61  auto src_blk_range =
62  TiledArray::BlockRange(detail::make_ta_range(src_range),
63  dst_range.lobound(), dst_range.upbound());
64  using std::data;
65  auto src_view = TiledArray::make_const_map(data(src), src_blk_range);
66 
67  dst = src_view;
68 }
69 
71 
83 template <typename T, typename Allocator_, typename Range_, typename Storage_>
84 inline void tensor_to_btas_subtensor(const Tensor<T, Allocator_>& src,
85  btas::Tensor<T, Range_, Storage_>& dst) {
86  TA_ASSERT(dst.range().rank() == src.range().rank());
87 
88  const auto& src_range = src.range();
89  const auto& dst_range = dst.range();
90  auto dst_blk_range =
91  TiledArray::BlockRange(detail::make_ta_range(dst_range),
92  src_range.lobound(), src_range.upbound());
93  using std::data;
94  auto dst_view = TiledArray::make_map(data(dst), dst_blk_range);
95 
96  dst_view = src;
97 }

99 namespace detail {
100 
103 
110 template <typename DistArray_, typename BTAS_Tensor_>
111 void counted_btas_subtensor_to_tensor(const BTAS_Tensor_* src, DistArray_* dst,
112  const typename DistArray_::size_type i,
113  madness::AtomicInt* counter) {
114  typename DistArray_::value_type tensor(dst->trange().make_tile_range(i));
115  btas_subtensor_to_tensor(*src, tensor);
116  dst->set(i, tensor);
117  (*counter)++;
118 }
119 
121 
127 template <typename TA_Tensor_, typename BTAS_Tensor_>
128 void counted_tensor_to_btas_subtensor(const TA_Tensor_& src, BTAS_Tensor_* dst,
129  madness::AtomicInt* counter) {
130  tensor_to_btas_subtensor(src, *dst);
131  (*counter)++;
132 }
133 
134 template <bool sparse>
135 auto make_shape(World& world, const TiledArray::TiledRange& trange);
136 
137 template <>
138 inline auto make_shape<true>(World& world,
139  const TiledArray::TiledRange& trange) {
140  TiledArray::Tensor<float> tile_norms(trange.tiles_range(),
141  std::numeric_limits<float>::max());
142  return TiledArray::SparseShape<float>(world, tile_norms, trange);
143 }
144 
145 template <>
146 inline auto make_shape<false>(World&, const TiledArray::TiledRange&) {
147  return TiledArray::DenseShape{};
148 }

150 } // namespace detail

153 
195 template <typename DistArray_, typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
196 DistArray_ btas_tensor_to_array(World& world,
197  const TiledArray::TiledRange& trange,
198  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& src,
199  bool replicated = false) {
200  // Test preconditions
201  const auto rank = trange.tiles_range().rank();
202  TA_USER_ASSERT(rank == src.range().rank(),
203  "TiledArray::btas_tensor_to_array(): rank of destination "
204  "trange does not match the rank of source BTAS tensor.");
205  auto dst_range_extents = trange.elements_range().extent();
206  for (std::remove_const_t<decltype(rank)> d = 0; d != rank; ++d) {
207  TA_USER_ASSERT(dst_range_extents[d] == src.range().extent(d),
208  "TiledArray::btas_tensor_to_array(): source dimension does "
209  "not match destination dimension.");
210  }
211 
212  using Tensor_ = btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>;
213  using Policy_ = typename DistArray_::policy_type;
214  const auto is_sparse = !is_dense_v<Policy_>;
215 
216  // Check that this is not a distributed computing environment
217  if (!replicated)
218  TA_USER_ASSERT(
219  world.size() == 1,
220  "An array can be created from a btas::Tensor if the number of World "
221  "ranks is greater than 1 only when replicated=true.");
222 
223  // Make a shape, only used if making a sparse array
224  using Shape_ = typename DistArray_::shape_type;
225  Shape_ shape = detail::make_shape<is_sparse>(world, trange);
226 
227  // Create a new tensor
228  DistArray_ array =
229  (replicated && (world.size() > 1)
230  ? DistArray_(
231  world, trange, shape,
232  std::static_pointer_cast<typename DistArray_::pmap_interface>(
233  std::make_shared<detail::ReplicatedPmap>(
234  world, trange.tiles_range().volume())))
235  : DistArray_(world, trange, shape));
236 
237  // Spawn copy tasks
238  madness::AtomicInt counter;
239  counter = 0;
240  std::int64_t n = 0;
241  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < array.size(); ++i) {
242  world.taskq.add(
243  &detail::counted_btas_subtensor_to_tensor<DistArray_, Tensor_>, &src,
244  &array, i, &counter);
245  ++n;
246  }
247 
248  // Wait until the write tasks are complete
249  array.world().await([&counter, n]() { return counter == n; });
250 
251  // Analyze tiles norms and truncate based on sparse policy
252  if (is_sparse) truncate(array);
253 
254  return array;
255 }
256 
258 
282 template <typename Tile, typename Policy,
283  typename Storage = std::vector<typename Tile::value_type> >
284 btas::Tensor<typename Tile::value_type, btas::DEFAULT::range, Storage>
285 array_to_btas_tensor(const TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& src,
286  int target_rank = -1) {
287  // Test preconditions
288  if (target_rank == -1 && !src.pmap()->is_replicated())
289  TA_USER_ASSERT(
290  src.world().size() == 1,
291  "TiledArray::array_to_btas_tensor(): a non-replicated array can only "
292  "be converted to a btas::Tensor on every rank if the number of World "
293  "ranks is 1.");
294 
295  using result_type =
296  btas::Tensor<typename TiledArray::DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type,
297  btas::DEFAULT::range, Storage>;
298  using result_range_type = typename result_type::range_type;
299 
300  // Construct the result
301  if (target_rank == -1 || src.world().rank() == target_rank) {
302  // if array is sparse must initialize to zero
303  result_type result(
304  result_range_type(src.trange().elements_range().extent()), 0.0);
305 
306  // Spawn tasks to copy array tiles to btas::Tensor
307  madness::AtomicInt counter;
308  counter = 0;
309  int n = 0;
310  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < src.size(); ++i) {
311  if (!src.is_zero(i)) {
312  src.world().taskq.add(
313  &detail::counted_tensor_to_btas_subtensor<Tile, result_type>,
314  src.find(i), &result, &counter);
315  ++n;
316  }
317  }
318 
319  // Wait until the write tasks are complete
320  src.world().await([&counter, n]() { return counter == n; });
321 
322  return result;
323  } else // else
324  return result_type{};
325 }
326 
327 } // namespace TiledArray
